question: India's First War Memorial for Service Animals is to be set up in which city?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s first war memorial for service animals including dogs, horses and mules is to be set up in Meerut city in Uttar Pradesh.
The place will be dedicated for recognising the contributions and heroics of animals who have helped the army in counter-insurgency operations in Kashmir and in the battlefield during the Kargil War. Similar to the national war memorial of Delhi, this memorial will be established at the Remount and Veterinary Corps (RVC) Centre and College in Meerut. Tablets in granite with the name and service numbers of the service animals will be inscribed.
